## IPool.reportedPriceOfRisky property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Gets the reported price CFMM for the [IEngine.risky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.risky.md) token, denominated in the [IEngine.stable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.stable.md) token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reportedPriceOfRisky: Wei;
```

## Remarks

This implied spot price is a decent health check to see if a pool is earning enough trading fees. It should be close to the real reference price of the risky asset.
